 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבֹנָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבוֺנָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==frankincense== (from ***white*** colour, compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 33</sup>; Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic ***id.***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבוּנְתָּא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לבנת‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ([[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>3007</sup>); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is from <span class="bdbLangGreek">λιβανος</span>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[Exod.30.24|Exod 30:24]] + 18 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבֹנָתָהּ‎</span> [[Lev.2.2|Lev 2:2]]; [[Lev.2.16|Lev 2:16]] — used in preparation of holy incense [[Exod.30.34|Exod 30:34]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַמִּים‎</span>); used as incense [[Jer.6.20|Jer 6:20]], on meal-offering [[Lev.2.1|Lev 2:1]]; [[Lev.2.2|Lev 2:2]]; [[Lev.2.15|Lev 2:15]]; [[Lev.2.16|Lev 2:16]]; [[Lev.6.8|Lev 6:8]], compare [[Lev.5.11|Lev 5:11]]; [[Num.5.15|Num 5:15]] also [[Jer.17.26|Jer 17:26]]; [[Jer.41.5|Jer 41:5]]; [[Isa.43.23|Isa 43:23]]; [[Isa.66.3|Isa 66:3]] with shew-bread [[Lev.24.7|Lev 24:7]]; [[Neh.13.5|Neh 13:5]]; [[Neh.13.9|Neh 13:9]]; [[1Chr.9.29|1Chr 9:29]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשָׂמִים‎</span>); burned as perfume (article of luxury) [[Song.3.6|Song 3:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹר‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּבְעַת הַלְּבוֺנָה‎</span> [[Song.4.6|Song 4:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַר הַמּוֺר‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצֵי לְבוֺנָה‎</span> v[[Song.4.14|Song 4:14]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֵרְדְּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּרְכֹּם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָנֶה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִנָּמוֺן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲהָלוֺת‎</span>); as tribute to Zion [[Isa.60.6|Isa 60:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זהב‎</span>). — In Hexateuch only [[BDB#P|P]].
